articles.title: CDC advisors recommend RSV vaccine approval. What it means for older adults - ABC News
articles.description: Adults aged 60 and older may receive the vaccine, the panel said.
articles.content: A respiratory syncytial virus, or RSV, vaccine for older adults could soon be available after an advisory committee for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention voted to recommend them Wednesda… [+6470 chars]
